about.title: About Us
about.description: PURITY Fashion Studio Philosophy and Methodology

philosophy.title: Our Philosophy
philosophy.paragraph1: We believe that style is not just about clothes. It's a way of self-expression, confidence, and comfort in your own skin. PURITY was created for those who value quality, minimalism, and an individual approach.
philosophy.paragraph2: Our mission is to help you discover your unique style that reflects your personality and suits your lifestyle.

methodology.title: Our Methodology
methodology.subtitle: Four steps to the perfect style

step1.title: Consultation
step1.description: We get to know you, your lifestyle, preferences, and style goals.

step2.title: Analysis
step2.description: We determine your color type, body type, and style direction.

step3.title: Strategy
step3.description: We develop a personal wardrobe and shopping strategy.

step4.title: Implementation
step4.description: We bring the plan to life: shopping, outfit selection, building a capsule wardrobe.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We choose only the best materials and brands.

individuality.title: Individuality
individuality.description: Every client is unique, and we value that.

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: We support conscious consumption and a quality wardrobe.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Get in touch with us for consultations, atelier services, or any inquiries.

meta.title: Research - Discover Your Style | PURITY Fashion Studio
meta.description: Discover your unique color palette and silhouette strategy. Personal styling consultation and wardrobe analysis.

intro.title: Why Research?
intro.subtitle: Understanding yourself is the first step to authentic style
intro.paragraph1: Before building a wardrobe, we must understand who we are. Through deep color analysis and silhouette strategy, we discover which colors enhance your natural beauty and which shapes complement your unique body.
intro.paragraph2: This research phase forms the foundation of your personal style. Every future decision - from shopping to custom garments - will be guided by these insights.

process.title: The Research Process
process.subtitle: How we discover your authentic style

step1.title: Color Analysis
step1.description: We determine your seasonal color palette using professional draping techniques.

step2.title: Silhouette Strategy
step2.description: We analyze your body proportions to find the most flattering cuts and shapes.

step3.title: Personal Lookbook
step3.description: You receive a comprehensive guide with your colors, styles, and recommendations.

cta.title: Ready to realize your style?
cta.description: Take the next step and bring your style vision to life.

meta.title: Realisation - Bring Your Style to Life | PURITY Fashion Studio
meta.description: Transform knowledge into wardrobe. Personal shopping service and custom atelier garments.

intro.title: From Vision to Reality
intro.subtitle: Transforming knowledge into wardrobe
intro.paragraph1: Armed with your personal color palette and silhouette strategy, we now bring your style to life. Whether through curated shopping or custom-made garments, every piece will reflect your unique identity.

process.title: The Atelier Process
process.subtitle: How we create your perfect garment

step1.title: Consultation
step1.description: We discuss your vision, lifestyle, and the occasions for your garment.

step2.title: Dossier Creation
step2.description: We create your personal mannequin (dossier) for perfect fit.

step3.title: Design
step3.description: Together we select fabrics, colors, and finalize the design.

step4.title: Crafting
step4.description: Our artisans carefully construct your garment with attention to every detail.

step5.title: Fitting & Delivery
step5.description: Final fitting adjustments ensure the perfect fit before delivery.

cta.title: Ready for your transformation?
cta.description: Experience a complete metamorphosis and unlock your authentic self.

meta.title: Transformation - Complete Style Metamorphosis | PURITY Fashion Studio
meta.description: Experience complete style transformation. Courses, retreats, and photo meditations for holistic change.

intro.title: Beyond Style
intro.subtitle: A journey of self-discovery and empowerment
intro.paragraph1: Transformation is more than changing clothes - it's about becoming who you truly are. Through immersive courses, retreats, and photo meditations, we guide you through a complete metamorphosis that touches every aspect of your life.

portfolio.title: Transformation Stories
portfolio.subtitle: Real journeys, real results
portfolio.emptyDescription: We're documenting transformation stories. Check back soon!
